title: Forming and Supporting Startups
description: We interview both students and healthcare professionals and facilitate the team formation process, then supoprt teams as they develop and grow.

title: Weekly Speakers and Workshops
description: We invite experienced entrepreneurs and professionals to share their stories and provide feedback on projects.

title: The Helix Community
description: Food at meetings, social events planned throughout the year, and a growing network of alumni invovled in healthcare, tech, business, and entrepreneurship.
